job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end.
     * Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems.
     * A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions.
     * Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution.
     * Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution.
     * Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments.
     * Doing good - contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of snacks, drinks, birthday treats, and social events.
     * Great and easy accessible office location in Amsterdam.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Machine Learning Software Engineer

* Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end.
     * Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems.
     * A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions.
     * Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution.
     * Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution.
     * Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments.
     * Doing good - contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of snacks, drinks, birthday treats, and social events.
     * Great and easy accessible office location in Amsterdam.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building applications using Generative AI models and Python, specifically mentioning 'Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI)'. It also highlights developing and implementing ML algorithms, improving software solutions, and participating in technical strategy, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer who builds and deploys user-facing systems based on generative models. While 'Machine Learning' is in the title, the focus on 'Generative AI models' and application building points more towards the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of models.
job_tasks.phrase: developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end' describes the development of a software application and its integration with a backend system.
job_tasks.phrase: Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions' and 'Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution' and 'Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution' all point to the development and enhancement of software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution' indicates involvement in the strategic planning and technical direction of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments' implies a need to stay current with and implement advanced AI technologies, which often involves operationalizing them.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Doing good - contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma' shows an understanding of the broader business context and societal impact, aligning technical work with a larger mission.
job_tasks.phrase: Doing good - contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma
